componentMetadata.docblock: A form input with a label that can display error messages.

childrenComponentProp.name: errorMessage
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Error string to display in the component. When defined, indicates input has an error

childrenComponentProp.name: label
childrenComponentProp.docblock: String for the input field label.

childrenComponentProp.name: name
childrenComponentProp.docblock: String for the input name attribute.

childrenComponentProp.name: required
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Render marker indicating field is required.

childrenComponentProp.name: additionalClass
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Extra attribute for use by CSS selector, specifically by tests

childrenComponentProp.name: charMax
childrenComponentProp.docblock: max number of characters the field will accept
